    About us

    VSI- Online schooling done right

    Welcome to VSI, the Virtual school! For your child, we present the right balance of a great learning environment combined with the right values, quintessential life skills and a safe, secure and exciting place to blossom.

    At VSI, we offer everything you would get at a traditional school and beyond.

    Our programs are designed to provide students with a choice of selecting subjects, flexibility in schools hours, no travelling pressures and an engaging curriculum. We are committed to impart education to each of our student that is as unique as they are.

    Contact Us
    Our Curriculum
    Grade 5-8

    Subject Offered - English, Mathematics, Science & Social Science.


    Additional languages Hindi, Kannada, Marathi, Sanskrit can be opted.

    Grade 9-10

    Subject Offered - English, Mathematics, Science, Social Science, Business Studies, Home Science, Psychology, Indian Culture & Heritage.

    Additional languages Hindi, Kannada, Marathi, Sanskrit can be opted.
